abstract: The Spine Journal was honored by the American Society of Business Publication Editors for challenging studies supporting Infuse, a bone-growth product sold by Medtronic.
snippet: The Spine Journal was honored by the American Society of Business Publication Editors for challenging studies supporting Infuse, a bone-growth product sold by Medtronic.
lead_paragraph: Most media organizations hunger for recognition for their work. But on Friday, a different kind of publication received an award for its coverage: a medical journal.

headline.main: Medical Journal Wins Business Reporting Honor
